name: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 2
summary: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 2 for Evercade brings together five home computer classics from the self-appointed “rock stars” of the British game development scene, including Cadaver and its expansion The Payoff, Gods, Magic Pockets and The Chaos Engine 2, plus the 32-bit home console version of real-time strategy classic Z!
